summary: A young Sherlock Holmes seeks to bring down the criminal mastermind Moriarty as he solves a crime involving a blackmailed prince.
cast: John Barrymore|Roland Young|Carol Dempster|Gustav von Seyffertitz|Louis Wolheim|Percy Knight|William Powell|Hedda Hopper|Peggy Bayfield|Margaret Kemp|Anders Randolf|Robert Schable|Reginald Denny|David Torrence|Robert Fischer|Lumsden Hare|Jerry Devine|John Willard|Albert Bruning|Walter Kingsford

title: Sherlock Holmes
